Jason Kidd

Jason Frederick Kidd

(J-Kidd, Ason Kidd, The Engine, The Kidd, Mr. Triple Double)

Position: Point Guard and Shooting Guard ▪ Shoots: Right

6-4, 205lb (193cm, 92kg)

Born: March 23, 1973 in San Francisco, California us

College: California

High School: Saint Joseph of Notre Dame in Alameda, California

Draft: Dallas Mavericks, 1st round (2nd pick, 2nd overall), 1994 NBA Draft

NBA Debut: November 5, 1994

Hall of Fame: Inducted as Player in 2018 (Full List)

Career Length: 19 years

Frequently Asked Questions

How old is Jason Kidd?

Jason Kidd is 51 years old.

Where was Jason Kidd born?

Jason Kidd was born in San Francisco, California.

When was Jason Kidd born?

Jason Kidd was born on March 23, 1973.

How tall is Jason Kidd?

Jason Kidd is 6-4 (193 cm) tall.

How much did Jason Kidd weigh when playing?

Jason Kidd weighed 205 lbs (92 kg) when playing.

Is Jason Kidd in the Hall of Fame?

Jason Kidd was inducted to the Hall of Fame as a Player in 2018 (Full List) .

When was Jason Kidd drafted?

Jason Kidd was drafted by Dallas Mavericks, 1st round (2nd pick, 2nd overall), 1994 NBA Draft.

What position did Jason Kidd play?

Point Guard and Shooting Guard.

When did Jason Kidd retire?

Jason Kidd last played in 2013.

What is Jason Kidd's net worth?

Jason Kidd made at least $187,675,468 playing professional basketball.

How much did Jason Kidd make?

Jason Kidd made $21,372,000 in 2009.

What did Jason Kidd average?

Jason Kidd averaged 12.6 points, 6.3 rebounds, and 8.7 assists per game.

How many rings does Jason Kidd have?

Jason Kidd won one championship.

What is Jason Kidd's Twitter account?

Jason Kidd is on Twitter at RealJasonKidd.

What schools did Jason Kidd attend?

Jason Kidd attended Saint Joseph of Notre Dame in Alameda, California and California.

What are Jason Kidd's nicknames?

J-Kidd, Ason Kidd, The Engine, The Kidd, Mr. Triple Double are nicknames for Jason Kidd.
